task_description:
{'component_name': 'Authentication Component', 'description': '1. Core Technologies:
   - Technology Stack: React, MaterialUI, JSON Web Tokens (JWT)
   - Primary Programming Language: JavaScript
   - Database Technologies: Not applicable as this is a frontend component
   - Runtime Environment: Node.js for development, browser for execution
   - Integration Technologies: HTTPS for secure communication with external authentication server
   - UI Technologies: React and MaterialUI for building responsive and accessible user interfaces

2. Build and Development Tools:
   - Build System: Webpack for module bundling
   - Development Tools: Visual Studio Code, ESLint for code quality
   - Testing Frameworks: Jest and React Testing Library for unit and integration testing
   - Deployment and CI/CD: GitHub Actions for continuous integration and deployment

This component encapsulates all functionalities related to user registration, login, and token management. It provides a user-friendly interface using React and MaterialUI, handles secure communication with the external authentication server, and manages JWTs in localStorage. The component ensures compliance with security and accessibility standards, fulfilling all container requirements.', 'interfaces': '', 'algorithms': '', 'pseudocode': '', 'local_backend_service': [], 'asset_images_b64': {}, 'available_assets': []}

Task1.task_description: Implement a complete authentication component using React, MaterialUI, and JWT, including user registration, login, and token management
Task1.details:
Technology Stack: React, MaterialUI, JWT
Requirements:
- User-friendly interface
- Secure token management
- Integration with external authentication server
- Accessibility compliance
- Comprehensive testing

Task1SubTask1.details: Successfully initialized React project with required dependencies and directory structure. Created package.json with core dependencies and comprehensive README.md

Task1SubTask2.details: Successfully implemented AuthContext and authentication service layer with JWT handling and API integration

Task1SubTask3.details: Successfully implemented Login component with Material-UI form, validation, and API integration

Task1SubTask4.details: Successfully implemented Registration component with Material-UI form, validation, and API integration

Task1SubTask5.details: Create ProtectedRoute component for securing routes, implement route configuration, and handle authentication state-based navigation

Task1SubTask6.details: Unit tests implemented but failing due to localStorage mock issues. Need to implement proper localStorage mocking in setupTests.js

Task1SubTask7.details: Create integration tests for authentication components using React Testing Library

Task1SubTask8.details: Verify the visual appearance and responsiveness of authentication components

Task2.task_description: Create and configure essential public directory files including index.html, favicon, and manifest for the React application
Task2.details:
Create necessary public directory files with proper configuration:
- index.html with required meta tags and root div
- favicon.ico
- manifest.json
- robots.txt
Ensure proper configuration for React application serving and SEO optimization.

Task2SubTask1.details: Create index.html in the public directory with proper HTML5 structure, meta tags, viewport settings, and root div for React mounting. Include Material-UI font and icon dependencies.

Task2SubTask2.details: Create and add favicon.ico and manifest.json with proper configuration for PWA support

Task2SubTask3.details: Verify all public files are properly created and configured

Task3.task_description: Fix accessibility issues in authentication components, focusing on form field labels and ARIA attributes
Task3.details:
Address accessibility concerns in the authentication components:
1. Review and fix duplicate form field labels
2. Ensure proper ARIA attributes
3. Verify screen reader compatibility
4. Maintain Material-UI best practices

Task3SubTask1.description: Audit form field labels in Login component
Task3SubTask1.details: Review and verify form field label implementation in Login component using Material-UI TextField components. Ensure no duplicate labels in DOM while maintaining accessibility.

Task3SubTask2.description: Audit form field labels in Register component
Task3SubTask2.details: Review and verify form field label implementation in Register component using Material-UI TextField components. Ensure no duplicate labels in DOM while maintaining accessibility.

Task3SubTask3.description: Audit form field labels in ForgotPassword component
Task3SubTask3.details: Review and verify form field label implementation in ForgotPassword component using Material-UI TextField components. Ensure no duplicate labels in DOM while maintaining accessibility.

Task3SubTask4.details: Based on the audit results, implement necessary fixes to remove duplicate labels while maintaining Material-UI's built-in accessibility features.

Task3SubTask5.details: Verify that the implemented fixes resolve the duplicate label issues and maintain proper accessibility for screen readers.
